title: Class: Collider
intro: The `Collider` class represents a collider in the game. It is provided by a `Colliders` plugin, which also handles collision checks.

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: The type of collider to return. An array of types can be obtained with `Colliders.getTypes()`. Some standard types can also be found in the plugin docs.

arguments.name: options
arguments.description: The options for the Collider, like position, size, etc.

children.name: width
children.description: The width of the AABB of the collider. Do not change this value manually!

children.name: height
children.description: The height of the AABB of the collider. Do not change this value manually!

children.name: position
children.description: The position Vector of the bottom left corner of the Collider.

children.name: translate
children.description: Translate the Collider by `vector`. Same as doing `Collider.pos.translate()`.

arguments.name: vector
arguments.description: The Vector by which to translate.

children.name: moveTo
children.description: Move the Collider's `pos` to `point`. Same as doing `Collider.pos.moveTo()`.

children.name: scale
children.description: Scale the Collider by the given factor.

arguments.name: factor
arguments.description: The factor by which to scale the Collider.

children.name: rotate
children.description: Rotate the Collider (counter-clockwise) around its center.

arguments.name: angle
arguments.description: The angle by which to rotate the Collider, in radians.

children.name: rotateO
children.description: Rotate the Collider (counter-clockwise) around the origin.

arguments.name: angle
arguments.description: The angle by which to rotate the Collider, in radians.

children.name: rotateP
children.description: Rotate the Collider (counter-clockwise) around a given point.

arguments.name: angle
arguments.description: The angle by which to rotate the Collider, in radians.

arguments.name: point
arguments.description: The Vector around which to rotate.
